member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.NamedScope.NamedScope.Resolve(Ninject.Activation.IRequest)
member.summary: Resolves instances for the specified request. The instances are not actually resolved until a consumer iterates over the enumerator.
member.returns: An enumerator of instances that match the request.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.NamedScope.NamedScope.CreateRequest(System.Type,System.Func{Ninject.Planning.Bindings.IBindingMetadata,System.Boolean},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Ninject.Parameters.IParameter},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a request for the specified service.
member.param: The service that is being requested.
The constraint to apply to the bindings to determine if they match the request.
The parameters to pass to the resolution.
True if the request is optional; otherwise, false.
True if the request should return a unique result; otherwise, false.
